SAMPLES.DESCRIPTION: Courses returned in JSON format. The example below is for an accredited program (type=p)

PARAMETERS.NAME: complexdate
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Date of new complex date for POST(setComplexDate)

PARAMETERS.NAME: complexstart
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Start time for new complex date for POST(setComplexDate)

PARAMETERS.NAME: complexfinish
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: End time for new complex date for POST(setComplexDate)

PARAMETERS.NAME: Location
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Location for new complex date for POST(setComplexDate)

PARAMETERS.NAME: ConsultantID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Trainer ID for new complex date for POST(setComplexDate)

PARAMETERS.NAME: RoomID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Room ID for new complex date for POST(setComplexDate)

PARAMETERS.NAME: description
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: description for new complex date for POST(setComplexDate)

PARAMETERS.NAME: setupDuration
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Setup Duration in minutes for new complex date for POST(setComplexDate)

PARAMETERS.NAME: breakDuration
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Break Duration in minutes for new complex date for POST(setComplexDate)

PARAMETERS.NAME: packupDuration
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Packup Duration in minutes for new complex date for POST(setComplexDate)

PARAMETERS.NAME: venueID
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Valid Venue ID for new complex date for POST(setComplexDate)

PARAMETERS.NAME: withVenue
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: flag if yes - return venue data GET(getComplexDates)

PARAMETERS.NAME: withEquipmentList
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: flag if yes - return EquipmentList GET(getComplexDates)

PARAMETERS.NAME: trainerIDs
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Comma-separated list of contactIDs for trainers on the session. Example trainerID1,trainerID2. Trainer session details are updated based on the aXcelerate system settings. POST(setComplexDate)

PARAMETERS.NAME: sessionDate
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Date of new complex date for POST(setComplexDate)

PARAMETERS.NAME: sessionStartTime
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Session start time for new complex date for POST(setComplexDate)

PARAMETERS.NAME: sessionFinishTime
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Session end time for new complex date for POST(setComplexDate)

PARAMETERS.NAME: trainerStartTime_[trainerID1]
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Session start time of the individual trainer for POST(setComplexDate)

PARAMETERS.NAME: trainerFinishTime_[trainerID1]
PARAMETERS.DESCRIPTION: Session end time of the individual trainer for POST(setComplexDate)

DESCRIPTION: Set or get sessions for a workshop.
